about_the_game:
Quadrofriend - is a horror story in the walking simulator genre. The game features puzzles, Easter eggs, item searching, a quest system, references to movies and games, enemies you need to run away from, a well-developed story in the form of notes, dialogues between the protagonist and the antagonist.

Quadrofriend - will introduce you to the fascinating yet grim story of two old friends. To survive and return home, the protagonist must go through all the trials that his friend Jacob has prepared for him.

Features:

  • Walking simulator genre;

  • Tense atmosphere;

  • 3D surround sound;

  • Realistic graphics;

Puzzles:

The game features various types of puzzles, from ordinary item searches and film references to logic tests.

Plot and Tasks:

Quadrofriend primarily focuses on the plot. The game includes the speech and thoughts of the protagonist as well as the villain. The main storyline narrative system is built on notes, as in all traditional horror games. The notes may also contain hints, so we recommend reading them. There is also a task system in the personal diary, and the game is linear, so you won't have to wander around the location looking for specific items.

Enemies:

Throughout the game, you may encounter several types of dangerous enemies. The game does not provide tools for fighting enemies, and you will have to escape, making the right decisions to save yourself from certain death.

Scare Tactics:

As you progress, the main antagonist will try to scare you in various ways to break your spirit and prevent you from escaping this grim place. Be vigilant; danger can lurk around every corner.

short_description: Ethan goes to a psychiatric hospital to visit an old friend. Upon arrival, he discovers that the staff has disappeared and his friend has gone mad. Now, Ethan must endure brutal trials to survive and escape this nightmare.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
